rules_text:
When Distracted Apprentice enters, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
Legacy {3}{W} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its legacy cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
